title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.5 - Application to other classes of children
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.5 - Application to other classes of children

State Regulations

The duties imposed by this Part shall also apply with full
force and effect to every omnibus having a seating capacity of more than seven
passengers, being used to transport only children, instructors or other persons
acting in a supervisory capacity to and from child care centers maintained for
migrant farm and food processing laborers, or to transport only children, instructors, or other persons acting in a supervisory capacity to and from camp
or camp activities, or to transport only children, instructors or other persons
acting in a supervisory capacity to and from religious services or
instruction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
46.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
